channel.title: How to change the item command so that only mod n admins can use it?

item.title: How to change the item command so that only mod n admins can use it?
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

[quote=“ats3, post:2, topic:269646”]I think this should work

} else if (cmd[0].equals("item") && playerRights > 0) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));[/quote]

Missing a “}”

item.title: How to change the item command so that only mod n admins can use it?
item.dc:creator: @Rasmux Rasmux
item.description:
@Rasmux wrote:

My item command is :

            } else if (cmd[0].equals("item")) {
                Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]),
                        Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));

I need to change it so normal players won’t be able to use it.
